Class FurnaceRecipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.inventory.CookingRecipe<FurnaceRecipe>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Recipe, Keyed

    public class FurnaceRecipe
extends CookingRecipe<FurnaceRecipe>
    Represents a furnace recipe.

      • FurnaceRecipe

        public FurnaceRecipe​(@NotNull
                     NamespacedKey key,
                     @NotNull
                     ItemStack result,
                     @NotNull
                     Material source,
                     float experience,
                     int cookingTime)
        Create a furnace recipe to craft the specified ItemStack.
        Parameters:
        key - The unique recipe key
        result - The item you want the recipe to create.
        source - The input material.
        experience - The experience given by this recipe
        cookingTime - The cooking time (in ticks)
